author: Tan Lee Meng J:
casename: Techking Enterprise Ltd and Another v JFE Consolidators Pte Ltd and Another
counsel: S Mohan and Bernard Yee (Gurbani and Co) for the plaintiffs; N Vijay Kumar (Vijay and Co) for the second defendant
tags-parsed: Bailment/Bailees/Duties/Sub-bailee leaving bailor's goods in front of bailee's locked and closed warehouse/Sub-bailee alleging arrangement with bailee allowing it to leave goods in front of bailee's warehouse whenever warehouse closed/Goods subsequently stolen/Whether sub-bailee breaching duty to care for bailor's goods
